attributes.action: resign and be prosecuted for war crimes and deception of the British people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to resign and be prosecuted for war crimes against the people of Iraq and to be held to account for the lies and deceptions of the British people.

We also believe he has abused his position as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom and brought the good name of that honoured position into disrespect around the world thereby damaging the interests of the United Kingdom for the foreseeable future.

We also believe our interests as UK voters are not being served honestly by members of parliament of all parties in this matter and therefore can only conclude there is a conspiracy of silence which needs to be investigated.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
